Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientBoard
public class ClientBoard
extends java.lang.Object
ClientBoard class is a simplified representation of the gameBoard in model.

    • move

      public void move​(int oldRow, int oldCol, int newRow, int newCol)
      Method move updates modelView grid after a move action.
      Parameters:
      oldRow - of type int - the row of previous worker's position.
      oldCol - of type int - the column of previous worker's position.
      newRow - of type int - the row of the actual worker's position.
      newCol - of type int - the column of the actual worker's position.

    • apolloDoubleMove

      public void apolloDoubleMove​(int oldRow1, int oldCol1, int oldRow2, int oldCol2)
      Method apolloDoubleMove updates modelView grid after a move action, opponent's worker switches place with APOLLO (APOLLO ONLY).
      Parameters:
      oldRow1 - of type int - the row of previous Apollo's position.
      oldCol1 - of type int - the column of previous Apollo's position.
      oldRow2 - of type int - the row of previous other worker's position.
      oldCol2 - of type int - the column of previous other worker's position.

    • minotaurDoubleMove

      public void minotaurDoubleMove​(int oldRow1, int oldCol1, int oldRow2, int oldCol2, int newRow2, int newCol2)
      Method minotaurDoubleMove updates modelView grid after a move action, opponent's worker is forced to next space.
      Parameters:
      oldRow1 - of type int - the row of Minotaur's previous position.
      oldCol1 - of type int - the column of Minotaur's previous position.
      oldRow2 - of type int - the row of the other worker's previous position.
      oldCol2 - of type int - the column of the other worker's previous position.
      newRow2 - of type int - the row of the other worker's actual position.
      newCol2 - of type int - the column of the other worker's actual position.

    • setWorkerNumColors

      private void setWorkerNumColors​(int oldRow1, int oldCol1, int oldRow2, int oldCol2, int newRow2, int newCol2)
      Method setWorkerNumColors sets workers' numbers and colors for designated cells.
      Parameters:
      oldRow1 - of type int - the previous row of the first worker.
      oldCol1 - of type int - the previous column of the first worker.
      oldRow2 - of type int - the previous row of the second worker.
      oldCol2 - of type int - the previous column of the second worker.
      newRow2 - of type int - the new row of the second worker.
      newCol2 - of type int - the column of the second worker.

    • build

      public void build​(int row, int col, boolean dome, Action action)
      Method build updates modelView grid after a build action.
      Parameters:
      row - of type int - the row of the selected row.
      col - of type int - the column of the selected column.
      dome - of type boolean true if worker wants to build a dome instead of a block. (Only for Atlas workers)
      action - of type Action - the type of action.
